summary: This document appears to be an FBI interview summary (302 form) from December 4, 2021, with an individual who visited Jeffrey Epstein's and Ghislaine Maxwell's New York townhouses. The witness describes the interiors of the residences, including a room with a massage bed at Epstein's townhouse, and mentions having been placed in an apartment by Epstein. The witness also notes they have never spoken publicly about Maxwell and that their initial discussions with the government occurred without lawyers present.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document describes his New York townhouse, including his office and a room with a massage bed. The witness visited approximately 5-6 times and was placed in a New York apartment by him.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The witness visited her New York townhouse once and states they have never spoken publicly about her.

connections.description: Both are mentioned in the context of the witness visiting their respective New York townhouses, indicating their close association in the same social/professional circles.
Epstein placed the witness in an apartment in New York, indicating a financial or housing arrangement.

events.title: FBI Interview with Witness
events.description: Meeting where a witness provided details about visits to Epstein's and Maxwell's New York residences, including descriptions of interiors and a room with a massage bed.

locations: Apartment in New York (provided by JE)
keyFacts: A witness visited Jeffrey Epstein's New York townhouse approximately 5-6 times and Ghislaine Maxwell's townhouse once.
The witness described a room with a massage bed in Epstein's townhouse, which was dark during a tour.
Epstein had placed the witness in an apartment in New York.
The witness stated they have never spoken publicly about Ghislaine Maxwell and initially spoke to the government without lawyers present.
The document is an FBI interview summary related to trial preparation, indicating ongoing investigation activities in late 2021.
